# Drasteria edwardsii

| synonyms =
*Syneda edwardsii Behr, 1870
*Synedoida edwardsi
}}
Drasteria edwardsii is a moth of the family Erebidae. It is found from Washington, through Oregon to California.
The wingspan is 34â€“37 mm.
